body:
Hey guys, so 1st off i really didnt wanna do this but i haf no where left to go on this server, so ill be quitting from Avicus and probs minecraft for good since Avicus is the only server i really play on and enjoying my time with everyone, but i guess good times arent forever... I let my mouth slip once and i can never take it back... Im expecting a permaneny ban soon on my acc cause of 2 tempbans on my accord and excessive infractions, even though i tried really hard to keep myself clean, i just ended up falling back in the mud again. I just wanna say its been quite the ride, its been fun hanging out with all of you ever since my iTerraCubist days upto last night, but now i gotta just go, and lastly to Lokigh, im truly sorry i couldnt carry your name perfectly, i feel unworthy now as i say it.

Hope you all have a good time without me, who knows you might find a new Jiff, a new Worst One, a new Commentator for your games, a New Weeb, a New Me.

Sayanara.

title: Not Quitting Avicus (Explaination Below)

replies.body:
From the amount of infractions you have, you're not going to get a perm ban until you at least double the amount of infractions you have. Kinda odd to quit just because you got a short temp ban, besides, just try to avoid saying the type of stuff you said in chat in the future and you won't get any more infractions.

Anyways, if you're not joking about this, then it was nice having you on the server!

replies.body:
When I get mad I just write mean things in the chat bar but never press enter :] <-- That helps.
BUT KEEP IN TOUCH WITH ME.
We're gonna 1v1 on CS:GO one day lokigh!11!

replies.body:
:(
if you're really going to quit, then goodbye. It was fun to play and chat with you!

By the way, please don't leave just because of the infractions! It's very unlikely that you will get a permanent ban, so please stick around and see what happens! 

Just in case however, I will you luck in whatever happens and in your future endeavours if you leave Avicus. Assassins will always welcome you back.

Goodbye :'(.

P.S: Don't worry about Lokigh. He's hardly the best role model. xD

replies.body: Bye, good luck and have fun in life :(

replies.body:
Seeing that im gonna be missed ive actually decided to stay, ive been thinking about it again this morning and realized im pulling abit of a dick move just leaving cuz of Infractions and a short ban, i kinda regret making this post now and making you guys worry, my decision was too hasty.

All i really wanted to do was hangout with all of you on New Years for once on the server but i let that chance slip away...

Anyways, i will be staying and last out my ban, i will try to keep myself busy as much as possible until i get unbanned.

Hope you guys have a good New Years!
